title: Pandemic SHOULD NOTS
itunes:title: Pandemic SHOULD NOTS
description:
The Breakfast club is back! well lets just say 2/3 were because Charlamagne is still on vacation! But Envy and Yee held it down as they opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners been accused of stealing after video footage was released of a Soho Karen in New York accusing a black teen of stealing her phone, when it really was left inside her Uber. Moreover, they also opened up the phone lines to see what things our listeners have done through out the pandemic when they knew they should have kept their butts inside. Also, since Charlamagne was not in we had out listeners nominate a Donkey of their own.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
